name: Exposed to the Elements (David Estes-Smargiassi)
description:
Use elemental shields to block incoming attacks, and avoid anything that you are not shielded against. Enemies drop Try to get the highest score you can!

WASD for movement

E to interact with pick-ups

mouse to aim, any mouse button to fire

source: https://github.com/destessm/ExposedToTheElements
